mission.posting: D3f4ult had to leave the computer halfway through a hack, for personal reasons. Break into the target, finish the job, and clean up his work.

email.subject: Cleanup
email.body:
D3f4ult had to leave the computer halfway through a hack, for personal reasons. Break into the target, finish the job, and clean up his work. ---- Personal issues have pulled D3f4ult AFK for a while mid-job. I need you to go back in there, clean up any traces of his work, and finish the job.
I'm looking for the unreleased projects of "Funkenstein" - home server attached. Download any that you find and upload them to the hub server. Log from D3f4ult before he had to leave:
Kaguya: It's fine. D3f4ult: Really am super sorry. Kaguya: Don't beat yourself up over it D3f4ult: These are the details: D3f4ult: IP: 21.32.43.54 D3f4ult: login: admin D3f4ult: pw: redwood D3f4ult: I've already done the work on this system and a few others before it D3f4ult: so all you have to do is find the encrypted files, grab them, and put them on the dropbox D3f4ult: The client said they were something about unreleased music? D3f4ult: Also, I didn't get a chance to clean up my working files, so please do that for me
Good luck, -Kaguya

attachments.note: Clean up any files relating to D3F4ult on the base server. investigate further to find any unreleased projects upload them to the hub server
